Café / Restaurant

Fig & Co

A lush garden café located in a quiet corner of Kenthurst. Flavorful coffee and exquisite food. Indoor and outdoor dining in a picturesque environment.

Make reservation

1A Annangrove Rd, Kenthurst NSW 2156

Take a coffee break or enjoy a meal.

Always amazing experience

Our featured dishes

Some of our personal Fig & Co favourite dishes.

Smashed Avocado
$?

Grilled sourdough, tomato kasundi, asparagus, preserved lemon.

Eggs Benny
$?

Spinach, smoked bacon, egg, hollandaise, english muffin.

The Fig Double Beef
$?

Ground beef patty x2, shredded lettuce, american cheese, mcclure's pickle, garlic aioli, potato bun.

Southern Fried Chicken Tacos
$?

Chicken, sriracha slaw, tomato kasundi.

Green Bowl
$?

Spinach, quinoa, asparagus, avocado,poached egg and lemon vinaigrette.

Grilled Barramundi
$?

Fennel slaw, smashed new potato, hollandaise, preserved lemon.
